Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bombolitin III (BIII, Bombolitin 3, natural hemolytic; other BAPs, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA)

Literature Information.Literature: Toxicity:  the peptide is highly hemolytic to pig RBC erythrocyte (ED50 2.8 ug/ml).Structure:  helical structure in TFE may be responsible for membrane activity. Different from Bombolitin I, Bombolitin III is helical in aqueous at 1.3 mM. This helical structure in water is pH dependent (pH 3.5 less), likely from aggregation. updated 5/2020
Literature Information.Author: Argiolas A, Pisano JJ1985
Literature Information.Title: Bombolitins, a new class of mast cell degranulating peptides from the venom of the bumblebee Megabombus pennsylvanicus.
